settings.title: ABOUT US
settings.text: At Popeye's, we offer the latest in health and nutrition products so you can achieve your wellness and sports performance goals!

settings.title: Recommending to my Peers
settings.content: Love the knowledge the girl helping me had! Especially as this is my first time being there. I will definitely be back, and recommend to my peers.
settings.name: B. V

settings.title: Price was really good
settings.content: I was very pleased with the service and knowledge from the staff that helped me out. I got what I was looking for. Price was really good and came out with some good info on supplements.
settings.name: M. S

settings.title: Great Place
settings.content: Great place. The staff is always friendly and very helpful. They know about the products and they have great service.
settings.name: D. K

settings.title: Greeted me warmly
settings.content: I had planned for just a quick stop to pick a supplement I'd run low on and that was wonderfully facilitated by the employee at the store. Greeted me warmly, asked how he could help, and quickly found and priced the supplement I'd come in for without being rushed. Great experience.
settings.name: S. V

settings.title: Strongly recommend
settings.content: Couldn't ask for nicer staff. The new manager is awesome, super nice and helpful. Strongly recommend shopping here.
settings.name: C. C

settings.title: Excellent experience.
settings.content: Excellent experience. The rep was very helpful in explaining the difference between some different protein powders and providing his feedback on items. The rep was very down-to-earth and easy to talk to.
settings.name: N. R

settings.title: Fast and Friendly
settings.content: Fast and friendly service, the customer service rep was polite and understood my needs
settings.name: M. K

settings.title: Employee was excellent
settings.content: Employee was excellent and very friendly, I was also very pleased with the sale prices I received.
settings.name: T. G

settings.title: Amazing customer service
settings.content: Amazing customer service, knowledgeable on the products. I know when I walk into a Popeye's I will be treated right, with high quality products at the best price
settings.name: R. W

settings.title: Friendly and Knowledgeable
settings.content: Very friendly and knowledgeable about the products.
settings.name: N. S

settings.title: Very Knowledgeable
settings.content: The staff is very knowledgeable and helped me pick out what I wanted. Didn't try to upsell me.
settings.name: C. C

settings.title: Will always come back to a Popeyes
settings.content: The fella that was working the evening I came in (Nov 30) was beyond pleasant. He took the time to check prices and discuss some of the products. I greatly appreciate the time he spent with myself and my girlfriend who came along, she ended up buying two products as well. The sale that was on when we came in was a great deal. I bought twice as much as I expected to:) I will always come back to a Popeyes for my supplements.
settings.name: J. V

settings.title: Excellent Selection
settings.content: Very knowledgeable and helpful staff, will definitely be back again. Was able to get exactly what I was looking for, excellent selection of products in stock
settings.name: M.L

settings.title: Wide Range of Products
settings.content: The store had excellent service and a very wide range of products, I found what I was looking for very quickly. If you are looking for protein to help build muscle this is the store to go to!
settings.name: J. S

settings.title: Be Healthy and Get the Best Prices!
settings.content: "If you are reading this and have not been to Popeye's, then trust me go to Popeye's, it is not only for bodybuilders, it is for anyone that wants to be healthy and get the best prices, after you walk out of Popeye's you will forget you have 10% off at GNC because that is still 20% more than Popeyes, plus Popeyes staff actually know what they are doing and they are not pushy. Get their Phyto berry and Veggie Greens and your life will change for the better."
settings.name: D. M.

settings.title: Always Impressed
settings.content: Anyone that visits the Lloydminster store, will be pleased with the experience and the customer service they receive. I have gone there several times and I am always impressed with everything that they have to offer! I highly recommend Popeyes! Keep up the great work!
settings.name: L. B

settings.title: Best Price Every Time
settings.content: Great service! They do price matching which means you get the best price every time. That's why Popeye's supplements is always my choice.
settings.name: E. S

settings.title: Highly Recommend
settings.content: "Incredible experience... the guy working was extremely helpful and efficient.. I didn't want to leave.. and the product selection way exceeded my expectations.. I will be back soon.. highly recommend checking them out."
settings.name: T. R-D.

settings.title: Great Service!
settings.content: "The staff are always super helpful and the customer service goes above and beyond!"
settings.name: J. C.

settings.title: Is my credit card information secure?
settings.content: Our platform holds the six PCI standard categories and they are applied to each of our platforms: maintaining a secure network, protecting cardholder data, maintaining a vulnerability management program and implementing strict control measures. Network reviews and tests are conducted regularly to preserve this information security policy.

settings.title: I would prefer not to enter my credit card information online. Are there any other options for placing an order?
settings.content: At Popeye's Supplements, you can purchase our products the way you want. Of course, you can always shop at one of our locations or use one of our third part providers like Pay Pal Express and Sezzle.

settings.title: ORDER AND DELIVERY WHERE, WHEN AND HOW?

settings.section: ORDER AND DELIVERY WHERE, WHEN AND HOW?
settings.title: When will my order be shipped?
settings.content: Daily order processing cut off time is 11:00am MST*. Orders placed after this time may be processed and shipped the next business day. All orders are processed and shipped as quickly as possible. Please allow 3-4 business days as Canada Post (CP) continues to see significantly increased parcel volumes as Canadians adopt different shopping behaviors during Covid-10 and due to the important safety measures in place at CP protecting their employees and Canadians. Short delays may take place pending any order discrepancies, larger volume days due to special sales or offers, weekends and statutory holidays.

settings.section: ORDER AND DELIVERY WHERE, WHEN AND HOW?
settings.title: How can I check my order status?
settings.content: Make sure you have received the confirmation email regarding shipping. You may always contact us regarding your order at weborders@popeyesedmonton.ca

settings.section: ORDER AND DELIVERY WHERE, WHEN AND HOW?
settings.title: Can I view my order history?
settings.content:
Yes.

Hop over to the My Account section at the very top of the home page. Log in using your email address and password. You will then be able to view your order history.

settings.section: ORDER AND DELIVERY WHERE, WHEN AND HOW?
settings.title: Will you be able to notify me if there are problems with my order?
settings.content: We will notify you immediately by email if there are any problems with your order, including back orders and credit card authorization issues.

settings.title: Can I make changes to my order after I submit it?
settings.content: We make every effort to ensure that your orders are processed as quickly as possible. Due to the speed of most of our shipments, we cannot make any changes once the order has been submitted.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order once it has been submitted?
settings.content: We make every effort to ensure that your orders are processed as soon as possible. You can send a message to our customer service department as quickly as possible. If your order has not yet been processed and shipped, we can proceed to cancel it. If your products have already been shipped, it will be impossible to cancel this order. Once the products have been received, you will be able to go to the store to exchange them.

settings.title: There is a missing item in my order. What can I do?
settings.content: If an item is missing in your order, please contact our customer service support through email. Our team will then proceed to analyze your request and follow up with you within the next five business days.

settings.title: What should I do if I receive damaged or defective items?
settings.content:
We make every effort to ensure that your order arrives in perfect condition. Unfortunately, items may sometimes be damaged during shipping. We understand the frustration this may cause and will make every effort to replace the product as quickly as possible.

If you have received a damaged item, please send us an email at weborders@popeyesedmonton.ca.

Write down your name, your order number and include a picture of the damaged item so we can immediately take care of the replacement of this item.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange a product from an online or phone order?
settings.content:
Yes, you can return or exchange a product purchased on our website or by phone by visiting your nearest Popeye’s store.

However, you must provide the credit or debit card used at the time of purchase in order to proceed with the refund.

settings.title: Do I have to create an account to order online?
settings.content: You do not need to create an account in order to make online purchases. But with an account, you will not only earn Popeye's Bucks but also you will receive secret deals, be able to keep track of your purchase history and receive the latest news from our stores.

settings.title: I recently changed my address, my email address and/or my credit card. How can you change any account information?
settings.content: Go to the My Account section at the very top of the home page. Log in using your email address and current password. You will then be able to change your information, billing and/or shipping address, email address and password linked to your account.

settings.title: I forgot the password associated with my account. What should I do?
settings.content:
Hop over to the My Account section at the very top of the home page. Scroll down to the "Forgotten Password" section and follow the instructions to instantly receive a new password by email.

Do not hesitate to contact us for any additional information related to your account password.

settings.title: Are there any membership fees associated with Popeye’s Bucks?
settings.content: No. There are no membership fees for this reward program in any Popeye’s Supplements Canada locations.

settings.title: How do I earn Popeye’s Bucks?
settings.content: Popeye’s Bucks are automatically added to your account through our sales system. Every transaction earns you four percent of your purchase total before tax which are added to your account as Popeye’s Bucks. They will be added directly to your account, which will be linked to every online order you make.

settings.title: How can I redeem the Popeye’s Bucks linked to my account?
settings.content: You will need to visit one of our stores in order to redeem your earned Popeye's Bucks towards a purchase. While you can earn Popeye's Bucks by shopping online, there is unfortunately no option available to use them towards your online purchases at this time.

settings.title: Will I earn Popeye's Bucks by ordering online?
settings.content: Yes! You will be earning Popeye's Bucks just as if you were shopping at one of our locations.

settings.title: Am I supporting local when I shop at Popeye's?
settings.content: Good news, you sure are! Popeye's Supplements is 100% a Canadian company and the bulk of our products are made in Canada. We have put an icon on the picture of most of Canadian products to allow you to easily identify them. Or Click Here to Shop Canadian Brands!

settings.title: How can I look up the nutritional information on a product?
settings.content: Most of our online product sheets include the nutritional information label. However, if you need more details, do not hesitate to contact us for more information.
